title: Knife, late 16th–mid-17th century
medium: Steel, niello, brass, enamel, emerald, gilding
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade tapering towards the point. Decorative indentions on the upper edge. Blade engraved with scrolled pattern, gilded near bolster. Waisted bolster with stylized leaves and beaded horizontal band. Handle with niello scrolled pattern at back and front. Finial of volute capital, dark blue enamel, surmounted by rose enamel gadrooned urn and rozette at green enamel.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, late 16th–mid-17th century.
late 16th–mid-17th century. Steel, niello, brass, enamel, emerald, gilding. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-44.
